### Key Points
1. Lemonade is on the left of the accountant (Job 2).
2. The owner of the goat is between the owner of the turtle and the journalist (Pet 3, Job 6).
3. The person watching spy movies is in the middle (Movie-Genre 2).
4. The person watching epic movies is the person drinking sprite (Movie-Genre 1, Beverage 2).
5. The person drinking lemonade is between the person eating mango and the person drinking sprite (Beverage 1, Food 1, Beverage 2).
6. The person eating radish is on the left of the person eating mango (Food 2, Food 1).
